HTML5 Presentation

01 October 2015

Prepared this HTML5 presentation using the reveal.js framework in one morning. Everything worked surprisingly smoothly. The big plus of using HTML5 is the embedded interactive JS simulations.

Journal Club October 1: Parrondo, Juan M. R., Jordan M. Horowitz, and Takahiro Sagawa. “Thermodynamics of Information.” Nature Physics 11, no. 2 (February 2015): 131–39. doi:10.1038/nphys3230.
